card_1.cardText:
Unsolved Mystery  

===================

Deadliest Shooting In Modern America History
--------------------------------------------

Autopsy for Las Vegas murderer released to Associated Press/Las Vegas Review-Journal who filed lawsuit for access.

Flip Here

card_2.cardText:
What We Learned From Autopsy
============================

Las Vegas Murderer
------------------

*   No major drugs in system.
*   No clear physiological issues.
*   No further clarity on motive.

card_3.cardText:
Searching For Answers
=====================

> aWith a good deal of screening, I didnat see anything.a
> 
> Dr. Hannes Vogel, Dir. of Neuropathology Stanford University to NYT about examining shooter's brain.

card_4.cardText:
Why It Matters
==============

Many crucial unanswered questions remain for this morbidly historic crime:

“Why did he do it?”

“How did he plan it?”

“Did he have help?”

card_5.cardText:
Las Vegas Shooting
==================

Oct 1, 2017
-----------

*   58 people killed
*   800 +A injured
*   Deadliest shooting in modern American history – “modern” refers to recent data collection.
